name: jira-api-js-model
description: A JavaScript/TypeScript library which maps Atlassian Jira API responses/models to Node.JS and browsers. This facilitates writing Node or Forge apps with typechecking.
author: Matthew Schwartz <matt@mattschwartz.net>

scripts.lint: npm run lint:src:agile && npm run lint:src:version3 && npm run lint:src:files
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:src:agile -- --fix && npm run lint:src:version3 -- --fix && npm run lint:src:files -- --fix
scripts.doc: typedoc --name "Jira.js - Jira Cloud API library" --out docs ./src/index.ts --plugin typedoc-plugin-extras --footerDate --footerTime --footerTypedocVersion --favicon https://svgshare.com/i/bHF.svg
